verbs.description: The Trump Organization [V: was] pursuing a deal with a sanctioned Russian bank at the height of the 2016 US election .
[ARG0: The Trump Organization] was [V: pursuing] [ARG1: a deal with a sanctioned Russian bank] [ARGM-TMP: at the height of the 2016 US election] .
The Trump Organization was pursuing a deal with a [V: sanctioned] [ARG1: Russian bank] at the height of the 2016 US election .
